about: The Luhn algorithm is a simple check digit formula used to validate a variety of identification numbers, including most credit cards. It helps to detect accidental errors in numbers such as mistyped digits. (<WikipediaLink>Wikipedia</WikipediaLink>)
description: Helper page for calculating numbers that pass the Luhn validation algorithm.
err_too_long: Too long: needs to be {{len}} digits
err_too_short: Too short: needs to be {{len}} digits

title: Luhn Calculator
valid_luhn: Yay! This number passes Luhn validation!
